line_1: First Poets, all the World agrees,
line_2: Write half to profit, half to please.

line_1: I argue thus: The World agrees,
line_2: That He writes well, who writes with Ease:

line_1: So just thy action with thy part agrees,
line_2: Such is thy native elegance and ease,

line_1: With every system of the sage agrees.
line_2: And every symptom of the strange disease

line_1: While his, as all mankind agrees,
line_2: Tho' wrote with care, are wrote with ease.
